item.caption: Update interval(sec)
item.comment: Instant Messenger update interval (Lite version only).

item.caption: Idle time
item.comment: It is amount of time, after which user's status changes to idle.

item.caption: Delete time
item.comment: It is amount of time, after which user's status changes to delete.

item.caption: File size
item.comment: Maximum available size of file for transferring (in Megabytes).

item.caption: Use sounds
item.comment: Use sound on different chat events(login, change room, start/stop video transfer and etc)
